scripts.prebuild: [[ $CI = true ]] && npx pnpm@8 install --store=node_modules/.pnpm-store || echo skiping pnpm install; turbo run prebuild
scripts.changeset: pnpm -r exec pnpm run --if-present addVersion && npx changeset
scripts.publish: pnpm run build && npx changeset tag && pnpm -r publish packages --no-git-checks --filter=./packages/**
scripts.version: npx changeset version && pnpm -r exec pnpm run --if-present addVersion
